Application Name: The Dali Museum.
Number of Reviews: 37.00.
Application Description: Get surreal with The Dali Museum‚Äôs free app and immerse yourself in Salvador Dali‚Äôs imaginative world.¬†The Dali Museum app includes:¬†Maps: With wayfinding and GPS-enabled map technology, you‚Äôll be able to explore every inch of The Dali Museum‚Äôs exquisite space. Themed and Virtual Tours: Explore The Dali Museum from anywhere in the world with just the tap of a finger. Learn more about the artist and his works through tours of the Permanent Collection, Dali in the Details, Dali Decoded and more.¬†Event Calendar: With up-to-date event notifications and calendars, you‚Äôll know about every exhibition, special event and program offering.¬†And more!¬†Dive into the mind of the master, Salvador Dali‚Äîdownload The Dali Museum app now.About The Dali Museum: Located in an architectural wonder on the beautiful waterfront of St. Petersburg, FL, USA, The Dali Museum cares for and shares an unparalleled collection of Dali artwork, representing every moment and medium of his prolific artistic activity. To learn more about The Dali Museum and Salvador Dali, visit TheDali.orgRead moreCollapse.
Number of Characters in Description: 1085.00.
Overall Rate: 3.40.
First Page Reviews: I had high hopes but was disappointed. After the 4th or 5th painting, the numbers no longer lined up. And it was pretty tough to find the paintings in numerical order. After painting number 8 I think it was, the next one over was like 36. And it's not easy to go from 8 to 36 in the app...that's 32 v...Full ReviewI had high hopes but was disappointed. After the 4th or 5th painting, the numbers no longer lined up. And it was pretty tough to find the paintings in numerical order. After painting number 8 I think it was, the next one over was like 36. And it's not easy to go from 8 to 36 in the app...that's 32 very slow swipes. I spent way too much time staring at my phone and trying to find the right painting to go with the narration in the app. It would have been a richer experience without the app. Playing audio required holding phone to ear even when earphones were plugged in. Point of AR was not evident. Too bad, because the museum has very little interpretatve information posted next to works. New AR exhibit doesn't work the way it should. I was very excited to use this app in the AR exhibit but the download got stuck several times, taking over an hour to download all paintings and then only half functioned. I could see the experience in others phones and hopefully redownloading allows it...Full ReviewNew AR exhibit doesn't work the way it should. I was very excited to use this app in the AR exhibit but the download got stuck several times, taking over an hour to download all paintings and then only half functioned. I could see the experience in others phones and hopefully redownloading allows it to work. the museum app and tour is great. But showcase exhibits like the AT one not functioning for me was a real disappointment. Very unstable. Just downloaded the update and can barely get past the main menu. Tried checking out events page for the weekend I'm going to be there... it has taken 45-60 seconds to load and even once that's finished it keeps crashing. Didnt have any problems with the app last year but so far it ai...Full ReviewVery unstable. Just downloaded the update and can barely get past the main menu. Tried checking out events page for the weekend I'm going to be there... it has taken 45-60 seconds to load and even once that's finished it keeps crashing. Didnt have any problems with the app last year but so far it ain't happening. ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è.
